Articles.Content:
Hi there!

Merf here. Just saying hi (duh!) and just want to get to know some of the community of this wonderful (-ly complicated) game! So far I haven\'t even made it out of the atmosphere of the planet ;/ as the only ship that I think is spaceworthy hasn\'t got enough support and falls apart on the pad -.-

If there\'s any tips and stuff they would be much appreciated. Poor Kerbals have died enough times already.

Thanks, and hi again!

Merf Avenger

Welcome to the forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Cap\'n ping111

(Arise my copycat minions!)

Heh, here\'s a spaceworthy rocket. Open your KSP folder and drop it in 'Ships'.

Just flip it to the horizon at 32 kilometers.
